summary: Rational side of brain: this is just a camera angle from 3x04. Nothing unusual. AM is a more concrete show (aka it’s not crazy...
body:
Rational side of brain: this is just a camera angle from 3x04. Nothing unusual. AM is a more concrete show (aka it’s not crazy meta like GMW) and doesn’t go crazy with camera angles or props like that.

Delusional side of brain: put this symbolism in the MoMA I stg

summary: 31 Days Of Andi Mack
body:
31 Days Of Andi Mack

Day 31: Fic/edit/art/moodboard about going trick or treating.

I’m doing a fic for this one so I don’t have to find pictures of the cast in costume(I tried for the other moodboard and it was really fricken hard dude). This took me so long to do, not because it has a high word count(which it doesn’t), but because I was procrastinating so much. I started writing this on like, day 10 lol.

Trick Or Treat

Word Count: 386(v v short)

Pairings: Tyrus, Bandi if you want

Summary: The GHC go trick-or-treating.

“Cyrus, come on!” Buffy yells, pulling him along, Andi in tow.

“I’m coming, I’m coming!” Cyrus whines, struggling to get out of Buffy’s grasp.

The GHC had decided this year to do the amazing group costume Andi and Buffy had spent years trying to convince Cyrus to do with them. Powerpuff Girls.

Cyrus moves the material of his blue shirt, thankful that Buffy didn’t make him wear a dress like she and Andi were.

They arrive at their first house, a small yellow one with minimal decorations. When they walk up to the door, an elderly couple walk out.

“Oh wow! What amazing costumes!” The lady says, smiling proudly, “Powerpuff Girls! My daughter used to love that show!”

The man hands them each a candy bar, smiles, then joins his wife in walking back into their house.

———

After many hours of trick-or-treating, they arrive at the final house, a quite small blue house with the coolest decorations they had seen all night. Animatronic spiders, ghosts hanging from the trees, and an amazing cemetery scene in the front yard. They walk up to the house in awe of the decorations, and knock on the door. When the door opens, they are greeted by a familiar face. Tj, dressed as a vampire.

“Tj? You live here?” Buffy said in shock.

“Yeah. You like the decorations?” Tj proudly replied, “It took me like four hours to set up, Amber was absolutely no help.”

Cyrus was blushing like crazy. He was at his crush’s house, on Halloween, and he was dressed like Bubbles, “Hi Tj,” he said, his voice breaking.

“Underdog! Nice costume!” Tj replies, nonchalantly checking Cyrus out.

“You like it?”

“Yeah. You look really cute,” Tj says, before realizing what he said, “I-I mean, um…”

“Thanks, I think you look cute in your costume too,” Cyrus replies quickly, elbowing Buffy when she fake-vomits.

“Underdog?” Tj says quietly, “Would you maybe want to go out sometime?”

“Yes! I mean, yeah sure whatever,” Cyrus says, trying to seem chill.

“Cool, I’ll text you later. And here, is your candy!” Tj replies, handing a couple pieces of candy to Andi and Buffy, then grabbing a handful for Cyrus, “Bye guys!”

Cyrus suddenly decides to be bold, running up to Tj and planting a quick kiss on his cheek, “Bye Tj.”

blog.name: i-am-beyoutiful
blog.title: My Oh So Crazy Life
blog.description: I love a lot of different things. This blog is a compilation of all of them. Get ready for the craziness that is my brain at work #nerdnation

summary: #31DaysOfAndiMack Day 31
body:
#31DaysOfAndiMack Day 31

Prompt: Fic/edit/art/moodboard about going trick or treating

  • Andi, Cyrus and Buffy are excited all day to go trick or treating. Some of their classmates have tried to deter them but they don’t let that stop them.
  • They went straight home to change into their costumes. They all promise to meet up at Andi house to start the night. Buffy and Andi decide to dress up as Cher and Dionne from clueless. Cyrus dressed up as meet from fantastic beasts.
  • They when they get to Andi house they start by getting candy from cece and ham before join the fray of other kids and teens grabbing candy and getting scared
  • It’s been a couple of hours and the GHC have their first bag of candy half full. On their adventure they run into Jonah and some of his ultimate teammates. Their dressed as the avengers and Jonah is Spider-Man.
  • They talk for a little bit and Andi invites Jonah to spend the rest of Halloween with them since his friends are headed in for the night.
  • The crew continue to travel the neighborhood as their bags get more and more full.
  • Without their knowledge, Cyrus leads them to and unfamiliar road in town. Andi, Buffy and Cyrus question him. The only explanation he gives is that he is picking up the other part of his costume.
  • Cyrus run off to front door with a smile. The others stand behind him confused until the door opens to reveal…….
  • Tj dressed as Percival Graves. Tj smiles at Cyrus before yelling into the house, “mom, Cyrus is here I’m gone!”. Tj’s mother replies and Cyrus brings him over.
  • Cyrus explains that he’s sorry for not telling them about Tj joining them. Luckily for Cyrus even Buffy doesn’t kind.
  • They circle back to some last stops on Buffy’s block. They make their last stop at a nice house with spiderweb covering it. They ring the doorbell and the door opens for them to see walker dressed as a painter.
  • Walker gives them all candy and ask what else their up to tonight. Buffy tells him they are on their way back to Andi’s house to watch movies and launch themselves into candy overdoses if he want to join. Walker grabs his coat and they head out.
  • Finally they all crowd around the tv watching hocus pocus with bex and Bowie everyone trading off candy and jokes. Everyone jumping up, running around and singing I put a spell on you with the most enthusiasm ever. It was a great night.

I DID IT!!!!!!

All thirty one day of Andi Mack completely done. I really enjoyed this. It was really fun to stretch my creative juices everyday to find answers for these prompts. Some turned out better then others but I’m ok with that. I hoe everyone had fun and enjoys the rest of this season. Also Happy Happy Halloween 🎃 👻!!!!

summary: I just wanted to say how happy 31 Days of Andi Mack made me! It was so much fun coming up with theories and headcanons and...
body: I just wanted to say how happy 31 Days of Andi Mack made me! It was so much fun coming up with theories and headcanons and celebrating a show that I have come to love with all of my heart with a loving community of people who love it just as much as I do. I’m sad that it’s over, but I’m so glad that it happened and that I got to take part in it. I love you all and can not wait to watch, celebrate, and create for Andi Mack even further. Thank you to the creators of this wonderful event and to everyone who participated. I hope we as a fandom do more things like this.

summary: La toma más CALIENTE: TJ es el estudiante gay más abierto y cómodo en Jefferson, y todos lo saben, excepto cyrus. Además,...
body:
La toma más CALIENTE:

TJ es el estudiante gay más abierto y cómodo en Jefferson, y todos lo saben, excepto cyrus.

Además, literalmente TODOS saben acerca del enamoramiento de TJ en cyrus excepto cyrus y nadie le dirá a cyrus porque piensan que es obvio.

(créditos a la persona que lo publico esto solo es una traduccion de la publicación original)

summary: WAIT GUYS I JUST REALIZED THAT THE HOODIE TJ IS WEARING AT THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW EPISODE IS THE SAME HOODIE HE WAS WEARING IN...
body:
WAIT GUYS I JUST REALIZED THAT THE HOODIE TJ IS WEARING AT THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW EPISODE IS THE SAME HOODIE HE WAS WEARING IN THE SWINGSET SCENE (or very similar to it at least) WHICH MEANS THE MUFFIN WASNT THE ONLY TYRUS CALL BACK IN THE EPISODE!!!

(screenshots credit to: @seraph-novak and @tayd-together-with-a-smile)
